text: @SpeakerPelosi AND yet again, you lifetime politicians are playing politics. You failed to mention the bull-crap you added to Stimulus package.  25million for the Kennedy Center.  You are pure evil, you may even be the COVID19 originator!  #EvilSpeakeroftheHouse

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
